Package app.gui.board.grid

Package provides classes that provide graphical representation for board segments, different grids

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Grid
    Base class for rendering grids.
    PrimaryGrid
    Extends base Grid class to represent primary grid in game.
    TrackingGrid
    Extends base Grid class to represent tracking grid in the game.

Package app.gui.board.grid Description

Package provides classes that provide graphical representation for board segments, different grids
